water.name: Percentage of improved water points that are functional
Percentage of taps that are functional
Percentage of hand pumps that are functional

education.name: Number of primary schools (preprimary, primary, preprimary/primary, primary/js)
Number of junior secondary schools (js, js/ss)
Number of senior secondary schools (ss)
Total number of schools
education.description: all schools in the LGA (public, private, religious, nomadic)

education.name: Primary net intake rate (NIR) for boys
education.description: Number of 6 year old boys entering the first grade of primary education, expressed as a percentage of the population of the same age.

education.name: Primary net intake rate (NIR) for girls
education.description: Number of 6 year old girls entering the first grade of primary education, expressed as a percentage of the population of the same age.

education.name: Junior secondary net intake rate (NIR) for boys
education.description: Number of 12 year old boys entering the first grade of junior secondary education, expressed as a percentage of the population of the same age.

education.name: Junior Secondary net intake rate (NIR) for girls
education.description: Number of 12 year old girls entering the first grade of junior secondary education, expressed as a percentage of the population of the same age.

education.name: Percentage of primary schools farther than 1km from catchement area
education.description: Primary schools located farther than 1km from the population they are meant to serve

education.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools farther than 1km from catchement area
education.description: Junior secondary schools located farther than 1km from the population they are meant to serve

education.name: Percentage of primary schools farther than 1km from nearest secondary school
Percentage of primary schools with students living farther than 3km
Percentage of junior secondary schools with students living farther than 3km
Primary net enrollment rate (NER) for boys
education.description: percent of boys aged 6-11 enrolled in primary school

education.name: Primary net enrollment rate (NER) for girls
education.description: percent of girls aged 6-11 enrolled in primary school

education.name: Junior secondary net enrollment rate (NER) for boys
education.description: percent of boys aged 12-14 enrolled in junior secondary school

education.name: Junior secondary net enrollment rate (NER) for girls
education.description: percent of girls aged 12-14 enrolled in junior secondary school

education.name: Gender parity index (GPI) for primary schools
education.description: Primary gross enrollment ratio for girls, divided by the primary gross enrollment ratio for boys.

education.name: Gender parity index (GPI) for junior secondary schools
education.description: Junior secondary gross enrollment ratio for girls, divided by the junior secondary gross enrollment ratio for boys.

education.name: Water & Sanitation
Percentage of primary schools with access to potable water
education.description: Schools that have not been with out clean safe water from an improved water source (pipe water, borehole/tubewell,protected well)  for more than 7 days in the past month.

education.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools with access to potable water
education.description: Schools that have not been with out clean safe water from an improved water source (pipe water, borehole/tubewell,protected well)  for more than 7 days in the past month.

education.name: Percentage of primary schools with improved sanitation/toilet
education.description: Schools are defined to have access to improved sanitation if that have toilet that flush/pour flush that drain to "improved" system, ventilated improved toilet or if they have pit latrine with slab.

education.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools with improved sanitation/toilet
education.description: Schools are defined to have access to improved sanitation if that have toilet that flush/pour flush that drain to "improved" system, ventilated improved toilet or if they have pit latrine with slab.

education.name: Percentage of primary schools with gender-separated toilets
Percentage of junior secondary schools with gender-separated toilets
Pupil to toilet ratio (primary)
education.description: number of pupils on average per toilet (target is 35 students to 1 toilet)

education.name: Pupil to toilet ratio (junior secondary)
education.description: number of pupils on average per toilet (target is 35 students to 1 toilet)

education.name: Building Structure
Percentage of primary schools with access to power
education.description: Schools with access to either functional generator, power solar system or power grid connection are defined to have access to power.

education.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools with access to power
education.description: Schools with access to either functional generator, power solar system or power grid connection are defined to have access to power.

education.name: Percentage of primary school classrooms needing major repair
Percentage of junior secondary school classrooms needing major repair
Percentage of primary school classrooms needing minor repair
Percentage of junior secondary school classrooms needing minor repair
Percentage of primary schools with a roof in good condition
Percentage of junior secondary schools with a roof in good condition
Health & Safety
Percentage of primary schools with a dispensary/health clinic
Percentage of junior secondary schools with a dispensary/health clinic
Percentage of primary schools with a first aid kit only (not a health clinic)
Percentage of junior secondary schools with a first aid kit only (not a health clinic)
Percentage of primary schools with a wall/fence in good condition
Percentage of junior secondary schools with a wall/fence in good condition
Learning Environment
Pupil to classroom ratio (primary)
education.description: Average number of pupils per classroom for primary schools

education.name: Pupil to classroom ratio (junior secondary)
education.description: Average number of pupils per classroom for junior secondary schools

education.name: Percentage of primary schools that teach outside because there are not enough classrooms
Percentage of junior secondary schools that teach outside because there are not enough classrooms
Percentage of primary schools with double shifts
education.description: Percentage of schools which operate in separate morning and afternoon shifts to accommodate more students.

education.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools with double shifts
education.description: Percentage of schools which operate in separate morning and afternoon shifts to accommodate more students.

education.name: Percentage of primary schools with multi-grade classrooms
education.description: Schools in which more than one classes are being taught within one classroom by the same teacher

education.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools with multi-grade classrooms
education.description: Schools in which multiple grades are being taught within one classroom by the same teacher

education.name: Percentage of primary schools with a chalkboard in every classroom
Percentage of junior secondary schools with a chalkboard in every classroom
Pupil to bench ratio (primary)
education.description: Average number of pupils per bench for primary schools

education.name: Pupil to bench ratio (junior secondary)
education.description: Average number of pupils per bench for junior secondary schools

education.name: Pupil to desk ratio (primary)
education.description: Average number of pupils per desk for primary schools

education.name: Pupil to desk ratio (junior secondary)
education.description: Average number of pupils per desk for junior secondary schools

education.name: Primary school pupil to teacher ratio
education.description: Average number of pupils to one teacher in primary schools in the LGA

education.name: Junior secondary school pupil to teacher ratio
education.description: Average number of pupils to one teacher in junior secondary schools in the LGA

education.name: Primary school teaching to non-teaching staff ratio
education.description: Average number of teachers for every non-teaching staff in primary schools

education.name: Junior secondary teaching to non-teaching staff ratio
education.description: Average number of teachers for every non-teaching staff in junior secondary schools

education.name: Percentage of primary school qualified teachers (with NCE)
education.description: Percentage of primary school teachers with the minimum requirement for teaching in Nigeria (Nigeria Certificate in Education, NCE)

education.name: Percentage of junior secondary qualified teachers (with NCE)
education.description: Percentage of junior secondary school teachers with the minimum requirement for teaching in Nigeria (Nigeria Certificate in Education, NCE)

education.name: Percentage of primary school teachers who participated in training in the past 12 months
Percentage of junior secondary school teachers who participated in training in the past 12 months
Percentage of primary schools that have delayed teacher payments in the past 12 months
education.description: Schools in which teachers were paid later than their scheduled pay day.

education.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools that have delayed teacher payments in the past 12 months
education.description: Schools in which teachers were paid later than their scheduled pay day.

education.name: Percentage of primary schools that have missed teacher payments in the past 12 months
education.description: Schools in which teachers did not receive pay at least once during the previous 12 months.

education.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools that have missed teacher payments in the past 12 months
education.description: Schools in which teachers did not receive pay at least once during the previous 12 months.

education.name: Textbook to pupil ratio (primary)
education.description: Average number of textbooks per pupil in schools in the LGA. Target minimum textbooks per pupil should be 4.

education.name: Textbook to pupil ratio (junior secondary)
education.description: Average number of textbooks per pupil in schools in the LGA. Target minimum textbooks per pupil should be 4.

education.name: Percentage of primary schools where exercise books are provided to students
Percentage of junior secondary schools where exercise books are provided to students
Percentage of primary schools where pens/pencils are provided to students
Percentage of junior secondary schools where pens/pencils are provided to students
Percentage of primary schools that follow the National UBE Curriculum
Percentage of junior secondary schools that follow the National UBE Curriculum
Percentage of primary schools where each teacher has a teaching guidebook for every subject
Percentage of junior secondary schools where each teacher has a teaching guidebook for every subject
Percentage of primary schools with a functioning library
Percentage of junior secondary schools with a functioning library
Drop out rate
Transition rate (primary to junior secondary) for boys
education.description: Number of boys entering the first grade of junior secondary school divided by the number of boys enrolled in the last grade of primary school.

education.name: Transition rate (primary to junior secondary) for girls
education.description: Number of girls entering the first grade of junior secondary school divided by the number of boys enrolled in the last grade of primary school.

education.name: Repetition rate (primary) for boys
education.description: Percentage of boys who repeat a grade during primary school because they did not pass the year before

education.name: Repetition rate (primary) for girls
education.description: Percentage of girls who repeat a grade during primary school because they did not pass the year before

education.name: Literacy rate of 15-24 year olds (men and women)
education.description: Literacy rate of 15–24 year-olds, or the youth literacy rate, is the percentage of the population aged 15–24 years who can both read and write.
